channel.title: Blogs on Tuco Imad
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Tuco Imad

item.title: Recieving Luča-1 (RS90S)
item.author: imad@ituco.dev (Tuco Imad)
item.description: As Montenegro soared into space with their own first Cubesat 1U satellite, I attempt and successfully recieve it’s telemetry GMSK data and decode it! Here’s what I found in it!

item.title: DIY Air Purifier and Air Quality monitor
item.author: imad@ituco.dev (Tuco Imad)
item.description: Tackling the air qualtiy monitoring question with cheap, albeit professional parts on the DIY - here’s how I’ve done it! And automated it all in Home Assistant.

item.title: Accessing WhatsApp and Viber raw databses and backing up
item.author: imad@ituco.dev (Tuco Imad)
item.description: If you’ve ever needed to fetch your WhatsApp or Viber database, this is how you can do it directly from the phone or from the hidden Google Drive, this is how you can do it! There’s even an automated way!

item.title: Automating beehives with sensors
item.author: imad@ituco.dev (Tuco Imad)
item.description: A practical way to automate some of the major questions that beekeepers face with their hives in regards to health, temperature and needs of the bees, as well as their productivity and honey health!
